//same as opening closoing bracket problem
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;

    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
        string s;

        cin >> s;

        int open= 0;

        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
            if(s[i] == 'T') open++;
            else open--;
            if(open < 0) break;
        }
        if(open == 0) cout << "YES\n";
        else cout << "NO\n";
    }
}
